name: ArmyGeneralOrders
0:
”Alexa, open army general orders”

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: army general orders
des: Alexa will read aloud to you and ask you questions about each General Order. You will recite back the General Order or complete it when prompted.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
